summary: An app displaying 51 laws and the preamble of the Indian Constitution with complete explanations

Implement detailed view functionality where clicking on a law displays its complete explanation in a readable format
Add search or filter functionality to help users find specific laws among the 50 entries

Design a cohesive visual theme with a professional, legal aesthetic using deep burgundy and gold accents with clean serif typography, structured layouts, and formal presentation suitable for legal content
Add frontend functionality to display the Preamble of the Indian Constitution in a prominent, accessible location with its complete explanation
Create a backend data structure in Motoko to store exactly 50 laws, each with a title, law number/identifier, and complete explanation text

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement backend query methods to retrieve all 50 laws and to fetch individual law details by identifier

Add the preamble of the Indian Constitution with its explanation

Add the 51st law of the Indian Constitution with its complete title, identifier, and detailed explanation to the backend storage
